  • Constructor Details

    • TrelloAPI

      public TrelloAPI(String boardName, String apiKey, String apiToken) throws IOException
      Base class for requesting information from the Trello API.
      Parameters:
      boardName - Name of the board.
      apiKey - Trello API access key.
      apiToken - Trello API access token.
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • getBoards

      public TrelloAPI.Board[] getBoards() throws IOException
      Returns:
      a list of all boards owned by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the request fails.

    • getSprintDates

      public String[] getSprintDates(int sprintNumber) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      sprintNumber - Spring number.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      IOException - If the request fails.
